评论详情: Product came with time to spare. Shipping was fast. I did not take the product out of the plastic because it was for my daughter for Christmas. She had this in our cart forever. When she got it, she was very excited, but when she put it on, she was no longer excited. She did not like it at all. The fit was too big, which she would have been okay with, however, the inside of this hoodie, was not like any other hoodie that we have ever seen. It was not soft or comfortable. It had an odd feel inside. She asked me to return it as she would not wear it. Item was returned.
The style and the way it looks is really cute but the quality is really bad it’s hard and right not comfy at all
He wears it everyday. Thick heavy material, good quality.
Fits perfect and the price was great!!!
the quality is horrible it feels like shein. and it was way too big and they need too clarify the sizes more. wouldn’t buy again

My daughter wanted this sweatshirt and really likes the look of it. The only complaint is the material. She thought it was going to be a softer cotton material, like most sweatshirts. It's more like polyester, but she still likes it.

评论概述: Good quality to a size up for oversize look
评论详情: Fits TTS and it is advertised as the oversize look recommend going a size up for this but the quality is very good

This hoodie is fantastic! The vintage embroidery is stylish, and the oversized fit is incredibly comfortable. Perfect for casual wear and adds a cool streetwear vibe to any outfit. Highly recommended!

This hoodie is the perfect oversized sweater for when you want something that's comfortable but not too hot. The inside is just cotton so that keeps it as a lighter sweater even if it looks heavy. The design is pretty cool and the colors go pretty nice together. The tan color looks a bit more yellowish in person. Follow the size chart, it's accurate.

I ordered the cream & green hoodie for my son, and he loves the design. The embroidery gives the hoodie a cool look, as well as the rips of the hoodie. My son told me the inside of the hoodie feels rough, but it keeps his warm.

I got this to add it to my son's hoodie collection since he can never seem to find one when he needs it lol he loves this one! I got the one in black with the blue design and he said it looks really cool and has gotten compliments on it.  My son says this hoodie nice and warm and comfy.

The material of this item feels thick and sturdy, suggesting it will last a long time. The craftsmanship is evident, with tight seams and no loose threads. The oversized fit is exactly as advertised, providing a comfortable and relaxed look. The graphics on the front and sleeves have a nice vintage vibe that really stands out. Overall, it's a solid piece with a good balance of quality construction and appealing design.

I wasn't expecting this hoodie to be so warm. I really love it, I got it for me to wear because it looked cool and I am glad I did.  There's no internal lining so it has this rough-ish texture, its not unbearable. It's still comfortable but it's not lined or a fabric with a fleece back. Noting that, this sweater is WARM. Regardless of the internal fleece being nonexistent, it's warm.  I like this a lot. I feel cool wearing it.

评论概述: I ordered the medium, it is unique
评论详情: You won't find a lot of hoodies that are styled like this, it is very much a fashion risk if that is what you like. Personally, I enjoy unique items like this.
